modName: The Emperor's New Cloak - An Invisible Cloak for Frostfall
summary: Because sometimes you just want to show off that behind without freezing to death.
descriptionHtml:
[i]This is the grandest mod of all time, and anyone who does not see that is either [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Emperor's_New_Clothes]stupid, incompetent or unfit for their position.[/url]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/EwyjJBA.png[/img][/i]

[b][size=5]What does it do?
[/size][/b][color=#cccccc]It adds a single item to the game, called "Emperor Cloak". This cloak is invisible (it does not have a mesh), but can still be equipped and will grant Frostfall's benefits of wearing a cloak.

Frostfall will recognize it as a [b]linen cloak[/b].[/color]


[b][size=5]How do I install it?
[/size][/b][color=#cccccc]Simply place InvisibleCloak.esp in your skyrim/data folder, or install it with a mod manager of your choice.[/color]


[b][size=5]How do I get it?
[/size][/b][color=#cccccc]The cloak can be crafted for [b]500 septims[/b] at a smelter, under the [b]clothing category[/b]. You could also use the console, of course - cloaks aren't exactly a challenge to come by anyways.

To spawn the item via console, first type the following command into it:

[i]help "emperor cloak"[/i]

This should return an 8-digit item ID, which you can then use with this command, where XXXXXXXX is the ID:

[i]player.additem XXXXXXXX 1[/i]

You should then be a proud owner of this fine cape.


---


Enjoy showing off your new threads![/color]
author: merrymac
